name: Creepless
description:
Creepless
This is a multiplayer co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Collect items, repair car and get out! But monsters will bother you.

Co-op for 4 players
You can play alone and with your friends, up to 4.

Normal and HardMode
There are 2 modes now: hard and normal. Normal mode is good to know game and understand what mechanics has monsters.
Hard mode is for crazy guys.

Monsters
I tried to create some unusual mechanics of monsters. Hope you will appreciate it.

Communicate
Feel free to send message about bugs or things you don't like in game by mail or steam community. I am reading it all.
